context: Hello, I am looking for some movie suggestions. What would you suggest?
Are you looking for movies currently in theatres? I like A Quiet Place (2018).

I want to have a movie night with friends. I have not seen A Quiet Place (2018) but I think it looks really good. I do love scary movies. One of the best scary movies I have seen in recent years is The Forest (2016) , have you seen this one?
If you like recent scary movies, I might suggest Annabelle 2 (2017). I have not seen The Forest (2016) The Forest (2016) is a good suggestion for me

I have seen Annabelle 2 (2017) it was very good. I also very much enjoy watching an old movie like The Last House on the Left (1972) and then watching the remake The Last House on the Left (2009) . It is very interesting to see what changes and what does not, to see the difference that all these years makes in the style of the movie.
I enjoyed House at the End of the Street (2012) but have not seen The Last House on the Left (2009) or The Last House on the Left (1972).
How about a recommendation for a comedy. After all these scary movies we will need something to lighten the mood at the end of the evening. Maybe something classic like Uncle Buck
entity: The Last House on the Left (1972)
The Last House on the Left (2009)
House at the End of the Street (2012)
The Last House on the Left (2009)
The Last House on the Left (1972)
resp: I like Death at a Funeral (2007), the original British comedy.

context.content: Hey! What kind of movies can I recommend?
I'm looking for an exciting and daring adventure movie that's also humorous and entertaining, as well as heartwarming and wholesome for the family. Any recommendations?
context.feelings: I love discovering hidden gems and underrated movies that bring joy. I hope the recommender can suggest something exciting, humorous, and heartwarming. Let's see what they come up with.

context.content: I haven't seen that one yet. I've heard Coco (2017) was pretty good, but I haven heard much good things about The Incredibles (2004)
Can you tell me more about Coco (2017)? I'd like to know if it's an exciting adventure movie and if it's also humorous and entertaining. And is it heartwarming and wholesome for the family?
context.feelings: I'm intrigued by the recommendations, but I need more details to see if they match my preferences. Coco sounds heartwarming, but I'm not sure about the adventure aspect. The Incredibles seems exciting, but I'm not sure if it's also heartwarming and wholesome for the family. I appreciate the recommender's effort, but I need more information to make a decision.
